resources.string: 1) What is the correct way to declare the primitive type that can only store \'true\' or \'false\'?
2) Which view is a text field that you can type into?
3) Which operator is used to check for equality?
4) In your XML file, which attribute is correct to specify which method is called when a Button view is tapped?
5) What is the keyword used to create/instantiate an object?
6) Check all of the resources found in the \'res\' folder of an app.
